string.name: name
string.value: Welcome Back to New Leaf City Day 2

Icebyrd Slimm, the one-man welcome wagon of New Leaf City, is itching to pick your brain. He wants to know how much you've learned about his wonderful city in the three years since it was founded. (2 of 7)
You're in the process of answering Icebyrd's daily question. Return to him and give him the correct answer.
He wants to know how much you've learned about his wonderful city in the three years since it was founded. (2 of 7)

Can you believe it's been three years since my New Leaf City became the talk of the entire Maple World? You've spent most of that time here, of course? Why not try to answer a daily question about my city? C'mon, quizzes are so in right now.
Good! Quizzes are the latest craze, you know. All the cool townies are doing it.
Hrmph! Well, we can't all be trendy, I suppose.

Here's my question of the day. Whose face is on the New Leaf Mall sign?

 #b#L0#Professor Foxtrot#l
#L1#Professor Foxwit#l
#L2#Professor Leaftrot#l
#L3#Professor Leafwit#l
#L4#Professor Nitwit#l
#k
Well done! After spending so much time here, of course you know the people and places of NLC like the back of your hand, hmm?
